basics.name: Alice Liang
basics.label: Landscape& Urban& Photography
basics.summary: A passionate urban spaces designer. I am passionate about connecting people, nature, and culture through design, bringing warmth and possibilities to cities.

work.company: Suzhou Prost Ecological Technology Co., Ltd
highlights: Participated in field surveys, including site surveying and field interviews
Compiled background information, including site history and analysis of the surrounding environment
Produced urban analysis maps and models, and assisted in drawing masterplans

work.company: Six Dimensions (Suzhou) Home Building Materials Co., Ltd.
highlights: Assisted with house measurements and created CAD diagrams for penthouses and detached houses valued £800K-£2M+
Produced 3D models and photorealistic renderings for residential projects spanning 200-500m²
Communicated with clients and refined plans until they were satisfied

Utilised an interdisciplinary, multi-scale approach to examine socio-economic and health-related crises arising from global urbanisation
 from geographical, policy, and ecological perspectives, focusing on developing urban spatial policies
Explored how existing and incremental policies can create equitable landscapes that benefit local communities
Applied visualisation tools (GIS, coding, interactive mapping, Blender) for data generation and modelling

Thesis: Growth Help - an online platform connecting vacant landowners with food banks to facilitate community food growing and
address urban food poverty

education.institution: Tianping College of Suzhou University of Science and Technologye
highlights:
Researched urban regeneration and community park development in historic Chinese cities, focusing on vulnerable groups and
social issues

Analysed traditional planning of ancient Chinese cities and classical garden design, and their integration into contemporary urban
and landscape practices

skills.name: [Soffware]
keywords: ArcGIS, Rhino, Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, etc.), SketchUp, Figma, AutoCAD, Blender, Microsoff Office, Lumion, Procreate, CapCut

interests.name: [Photography]
keywords: Freelance, specialising in urban landscape and portrait with commercial project experience
